contentrichtext.text: {{Nihongo|'''Yojimbo'''|用心棒|"Yōjinbō"}} is a Japanese word for [[bouncer (doorman)|bouncer]], or [[bodyguard]]. The term may also refer to: * [[Yojimbo (film)|''Yojimbo'' (film)]], a 1961 film by Akira Kurosawa, starring Toshiro Mifune * [[Yojimbo (software)]], an information organizer for Mac OS X * ''[[Yo-Jin-Bo]]'', a visual novel about three yojinbo * Yojimbo, a secret Aeon found in the video game ''[[Characters of Final Fantasy X and X-2|Final Fantasy X]]'' * ''[[Usagi Yojimbo]]'', an ongoing comic book series created by [[Stan Sakai]] in 1987. {{disambig}} [[Category:Japanese words and phrases]]
